title: Four(4) Tips For Making More Money In Pig Farming

tasks.task: Engage in business practices for peak farming profitability.
subtasks: Establish a positive reputation with external customers.
Cultivate strong relationships with internal workers.
Purchase high-quality, low disease risk livestock (LD stocks).
Treat the farm as a serious business requiring meticulous management.
Invest in expert knowledge to manage potential farm issues.
